title: Gravure paper printing machine US-JY-1000
short_description: This US-JY-1000 machine performs the function of gravure printing on paper and is used for packaging of finished products, catalogs, decoration, magazine and many similar purposes. Materials to be printed on include BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY and paper. Processing width reaches from 600 mm to 1000 mm. The speed of the equipment is 160 m/min.
short_description_uz: Gravur qog'ozlarga pechat qilish vazifasini ushbu US-JY-1000 uskuna amalga oshiradi va tayyor mahsulotlar qadoqlashda, kataloglarda, dekoratsiya, jurnal va ko'plab shunga o'xshash maqsadlarda foydalaniladi. Pechat qilinadigan materiallarga BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY va qog'oz kiradi. Ishlov berish kengligi 600 mm dan 1000 mm gacha yetadi. Uskunaning ishlash tezligi esa 160 m/min ni tashkil qiladi.
short_description_ru: Данная машина US-JY-1000 выполняет функцию глубокой печати на бумаге и используется для упаковки готовой продукции, каталогов, оформления, журнальной и многих подобных целей. Материалы для печати включают BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY и бумагу. Ширина обработки достигает от 600 мм до 1000 мм. Скорость оборудования 160 м/мин.
short_description_en: This US-JY-1000 machine performs the function of gravure printing on paper and is used for packaging of finished products, catalogs, decoration, magazine and many similar purposes. Materials to be printed on include BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY and paper. Processing width reaches from 600 mm to 1000 mm. The speed of the equipment is 160 m/min.
long_description:
This US-JY-1000 machine performs the function of gravure printing on paper and is used for packaging of finished products, catalogs, decoration, magazine and many similar purposes. Materials to be printed on include BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY and paper. Processing width reaches from 600 mm to 1000 mm. The speed of the equipment is 160 m/min.

 

 

Basic parameters
Model US-JY-1000
Printing materials BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY and paper
Printing width 600-1000 mm
Mechanism speed 160 m/min
Color register accuracy ± 0.15%
Plate cylinder ⌀120 mm-⌀300 mm
Winding & unwinding roller diameter 1200 mm
long_description_uz:
Gravur qog'ozlarga pechat qilish vazifasini ushbu US-JY-1000 uskuna amalga oshiradi va tayyor mahsulotlar qadoqlashda, kataloglarda, dekoratsiya, jurnal va ko'plab shunga o'xshash maqsadlarda foydalaniladi. Pechat qilinadigan materiallarga BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY va qog'oz kiradi. Ishlov berish kengligi 600 mm dan 1000 mm gacha yetadi. Uskunaning ishlash tezligi esa 160 m/min ni tashkil qiladi.

 

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-JY-1000
Pechatlash materiallari BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY va qog'oz
Pechatlash kengligi 600-1000 mm
Mexanizm tezligi 160 m/min
Ranglar aniqligi ± 0.15%
Silindr diametri ⌀120 mm-⌀300 mm
Rulonlar diametri 1200 mm
long_description_ru:
Данная машина US-JY-1000 выполняет функцию глубокой печати на бумаге и используется для упаковки готовой продукции, каталогов, оформления, журнальной и многих подобных целей. Материалы для печати включают BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY и бумагу. Ширина обработки достигает от 600 мм до 1000 мм. Скорость оборудования 160 м/мин.

 

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-JY-1000
Материалы для печати BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY и бумага
Ширина печати 600-1000 мм
Скорость механизма 160 м/мин
Точность цветопередачи ± 0.15%
Диаметр цилиндра ⌀120 мм-⌀300 мм
Диаметр рулонов 1200 мм

This US-JY-1000 machine performs the function of gravure printing on paper and is used for packaging of finished products, catalogs, decoration, magazine and many similar purposes. Materials to be printed on include BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY and paper. Processing width reaches from 600 mm to 1000 mm. The speed of the equipment is 160 m/min.

 

 

Basic parameters
Model US-JY-1000
Printing materials BOPP, PET, PVC, PE, NY and paper
Printing width 600-1000 mm
Mechanism speed 160 m/min
Color register accuracy ± 0.15%
Plate cylinder ⌀120 mm-⌀300 mm
